name: @gjsify/doclet
description: Experimental Valadoc extension to generate Typescript Definition files for Gjs and node-gtk

scripts.update:submodules: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule foreach git pull origin master
scripts.build: npm run build:meson && npm run build:ninja
scripts.types: npm run update:submodules && npm run doc:gtk
scripts.types:local: npm run update:submodules && npm run doc:gtk:local
scripts.doc:cairo: rm -rf ./@types/cairo && VALA_VERSION=$(valac --api-version) && valadoc --verbose --enable-experimental --enable-experimental-non-null --profile gobject --deps --use-svg-images --target-glib auto --doclet builddir --vapidir /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi --girdir girs/gir-1.0 -o ./@types/cairo-1.0 /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi/cairo.vapi
scripts.doc:gtk: rm -rf ./@types/gtk+-3.0 && VALA_VERSION=$(valac --api-version) && valadoc --verbose --enable-experimental --enable-experimental-non-null --profile gobject --deps --use-svg-images --target-glib auto --doclet builddir --vapidir /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi --girdir girs/gir-1.0 -o ./@types/gtk+-3.0 /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi/gtk+-3.0.vapi
scripts.doc:glib: rm -rf ./@types/glib-2.0 && VALA_VERSION=$(valac --api-version) && valadoc --verbose --enable-experimental --enable-experimental-non-null --profile gobject --deps --use-svg-images --target-glib auto --doclet builddir --vapidir /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi --girdir girs/gir-1.0 -o ./@types/glib-2.0 /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi/glib-2.0.vapi
scripts.doc:gobject: rm -rf ./@types/gobject-2.0 && VALA_VERSION=$(valac --api-version) && valadoc --verbose --enable-experimental --enable-experimental-non-null --profile gobject --deps --use-svg-images --target-glib auto --doclet builddir --vapidir /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi --girdir girs/gir-1.0 -o ./@types/gobject-2.0 /usr/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi/gobject-2.0.vapi
scripts.doc:gtk:local: rm -rf ./@types/gtk+-3.0 && VALA_VERSION=$(valac --api-version) && valadoc --verbose --enable-experimental --enable-experimental-non-null --profile gobject --deps --use-svg-images --target-glib auto --doclet builddir --vapidir /usr/local/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi --girdir girs/gir-1.0 -o ./@types/gtk+-3.0 /usr/local/share/vala-$VALA_VERSION/vapi/gtk+-3.0.vapi
